Title: True Love Tends to Forget 1:1-4
Plot: Michael goes after more power while he and Kath get ready for their little addition to the family.  Tommy tries to fix the problems in a bad area of The Hill.  Eileen learns from other politicians wives.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Len Cariou, Helen Carey, Tina Benko, Al Sapienza, Billy Smith, Wendy Hoop, Janel Moloney
